isis.stitle: Body Builder Electrical Data Book - CF 500, CF 600 Rear Axle - Wheel Hubs and Bearings - Full Floating Axle - Dana - Description and Operation

svcsubproc.title: Wheel Hubs and Bearings
svcsubproc.para: The rear hub is supported or floats on the axle spindle on 2 opposing tapered roller bearings. A rear hub seal is installed behind the inner rear wheel bearing to prevent axle lubricant from leaking onto the rotor. The rear hub is retained on the spindle by a hub nut tabbed to a slot on the spindle.
The rear wheel bearings are packed with a lithium-based grease to provide initial lubrication until axle lubricant flows into the rear hubs and the inner rear wheel bearings during vehicle operation.
